meta.title: Time
meta.description: A custom time input widget that can be used to control other components

props.description: Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag for the footer
Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag for the footer
When set, visually hides the selected time header

Tri-state prop. If `true` forces the interface to 12 hour format. If `false` forces the interface into 24 hour format. If `null` the current locale will determine the 12 or 24 hour interface (default)
Text to display in the AM/PM spinbutton when 'AM' is selected
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `AM/PM` spinbutton
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the spinbuttons `-` button
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `Hours` spinbutton
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the spinbuttons `+` button
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `Minutes` spinbutton
String to show when no time is selected
Text to display in the AM/PM spinbutton when 'PM' is selected
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `Seconds` spinbutton
Hidden sr-only string when a time is selected

Locale (or locales) for the component to use. When passing an array of locales, the order of the locales is from most preferred to least preferred. If not provided, defaults to the clients default locale
Step value for the minutes spinbutton. Should be a value evenly divided into 60
Step value for the seconds spinbutton. Should be a value evenly divided into 60
When true, shows the seconds spinbutton. If `false` the seconds spin button will not be shown and the seconds portion of the time will always be `0`
Initially selected time value. Accepts a `HH:mm:ss` string. Valid value ranges from `00:00:00` to `23:59:59`

events.description: Emitted whenever the internal model state, or locale, updates. Also emitted when the component is initially created

args.description: The context object. Refer to the docs for details
The selected time as an `HH:mm:ss` string. Will be an empty string if no time selected

slots.name: default
slots.description: Used to place custom controls at the bottom of the time component
